meanings.definition: A child whose baptism is sponsored by a godparent.
meanings.sent1: My godchildren were so excited to attend their first church service.
meanings.sent2: She has three godchildren whom she loves dearly.
meanings.sent3: The godchildren giggled as they splashed each other during the baptism.
meanings.sent4: Being a godparent to these children makes me feel like a guardian angel to my godchildren.
meanings.sent5: The bond between godparents and godchildren is truly special and meaningful.

meanings.definition: A child for whom one serves as a godparent.
meanings.sent1: The godchildren received thoughtful gifts from their godparent on their birthdays.
meanings.sent2: He takes his role as a godparent to his godchildren very seriously.
meanings.sent3: The godchildren were thrilled when their godparent taught them how to bake cookies.
meanings.sent4: The love between a godparent and their godchildren is unconditional and everlasting.
meanings.sent5: The godparent promised to always be there for their godchildren, no matter what.
